ui::​HorizontalLayout
public
ui.​AutoLayout
ui::​HorizontalLayout

the horizontal layout is used for packing widgets horizontally (left to right). it implements only 3 functions: pack_start, pack_end and pack_center

Functions
pack_start
void pack_start(
Widget *w,
int padding= 0
):

put this widget at the start of the layout

pack_end
void pack_end(
Widget *w,
int padding= 0
):

put this widget at the end of the layout

pack_center
void pack_center(
Widget *w
):

put this widget in the center of the layout
